Rotation.RotationList: [Misc] Init|[Misc] Pause|[Misc] Bossmod|Selfheal|Pillar of Frost|Raise Dead|Blood Tap (>10 and RP > 76 or KM)|Frost Strike (KM or RP > 88)|Howling Blast (Death > 1 or Frost > 1)|Soul Reaper|Blood Tap (Soul Reaper)|Howling Blast (no debuff)|Plague Strike (no debuff)|Howling Blast (Rime)|Frost Strike (RP > 76)|Obliterate (Unholy > 0 and no KM)|Howling Blast|Blood Tap (>= 8 or Calc > 35)|Frost Strike (RP >= 40)|Horn of Winter|Blood Tap (filler)|Plague Leech|Empower Rune Weapon
Rotation.RotationNotes:
left Shift - Pause Rotation left Ctrl - Switch Howling blast on/off left Alt - Switch DnD on/off
right Ctrl - Switch cooldown mode auto/boss only

Rotation.RotationNotes:
left Shift - Pause Rotation left Ctrl - Switch Howling blast on/off left Alt - Switch DnD on/off
right Ctrl - Switch cooldown mode auto/boss only
